title: sleep-debt-tracker
description: Sleep Debt Tracker is a web application built with TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML designed to help users visualize and manage their sleep debt over time. This project allows users to input their daily sleep hours and desired sleep schedule, calculating and displaying their current sleep debt. It's a helpful tool for anyone looking to improve their sleep habits and understand their sleep patterns.

title: devboard
description: Devboard is a modern web application built with Next.js 14 (using the Pages Router), TypeScript, and Material UI (MUI) to provide a flexible and efficient project management dashboard. Leveraging React Query for data fetching and management, this project demonstrates best practices for building scalable and maintainable React applications while incorporating popular technologies within the React ecosystem, making it a valuable resource for developers learning Next.js and related tools.

title: Map-Visualisation
description: This project, built with HTML and Python, focuses on creating interactive map visualizations. It leverages web technologies to display geographical data and provide users with an engaging way to explore and understand spatial information. The repository showcases a practical application of data visualization techniques within the realm of geospatial analysis, serving as a useful example project for those interested in combining web development with data science.

title: jovian
description: Jovian is a full-stack CRUD application built with Python, Flask, PostgreSQL, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting. It serves as a project demonstrating a basic web application framework, showcasing how to create, read, update, and delete data through a web interface. This repository provides a practical example for learning about web development with Python and integrating with a relational database.

title: robofleet-dashboard
description: The robofleet-dashboard repository houses a project built with JavaScript, Python, HTML, and CSS, designed as a dynamic dashboard application. This project focuses on providing a user-friendly interface to visualize and interact with Robofleet data, offering real-time monitoring and control capabilities for robotic systems.

title: NextJs-Dashboard
description: NextJs-Dashboard is a project demonstrating a modern, responsive dashboard built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript. This repository showcases best practices for structuring a Next.js application, managing data fetching, and implementing a visually appealing user interface. It serves as a practical example for learning and building scalable web applications using the Next.js framework.

title: raven-v2
description: Raven-v2 is a project repository built with TypeScript and JavaScript, exploring [mention the project's purpose here based on the README or your knowledge of it, e.g., "modern UI development," "data visualization techniques," or "a specific application like a note-taking app"]. It serves as a learning ground and showcases implementation of [mention a key feature or technology highlighted in the README, e.g., "React hooks," "D3.js integration," or "a custom state management solution"]. This repository focuses on the practical application of these technologies within the scope of [mention a broad topic area, e.g., "web development," "front-end engineering," or "data science"].

title: next-voting
description: Next-voting is a modern, real-time voting application built with Next.js, TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, designed to provide a simple and secure platform for creating and participating in polls and voting events. This project demonstrates a full-stack implementation, showcasing best practices for UI development with Next.js and potentially incorporating features like user authentication and data persistence, making it a useful resource for learning about project management and web application development.

title: ros-log-viewer
description: ros-log-viewer is a web-based tool built using JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting for visualizing and analyzing ROS (Robot Operating System) log files. This project aims to provide a user-friendly interface for filtering, searching, and understanding ROS logs, enabling easier debugging and monitoring of robotic systems. It facilitates efficient log analysis by presenting ROS data in a more accessible and interactive manner.

title: genietalks
description: GenieTalks is a full-stack project built with TypeScript, leveraging Express.js and the Gemini API to provide an engaging and interactive experience. Utilizing Vite.js for a modern development environment, the frontend is crafted with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, offering a dynamic interface for users to interact with AI-powered conversations and explore the capabilities of the Gemini API. This repository showcases a practical application of these technologies in a project setting.

title: next-idea-board
description: Next Idea Board is a project built with TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, offering a visual and interactive platform for brainstorming and organizing project ideas. This repository serves as a customizable digital board to capture, prioritize, and collaborate on potential project concepts, making it an ideal tool for individual brainstorming or team-based project planning.

title: finance-with-python
description: This repository, built using Jupyter Notebook and Python, showcases practical finance projects. It explores various financial concepts and methodologies through Python code, covering topics relevant to financial analysis, modeling, and data visualization. The goal is to provide a hands-on learning experience for individuals interested in applying Python to real-world finance scenarios.

title: resume
description: This repository contains the TeX source code and generated HTML version of my resume. It serves as a project demonstrating my skills in typesetting with TeX, particularly for creating professional-looking documents, and showcases my ability to convert these documents into accessible HTML format. The project is focused on presenting my qualifications and experience in a clear and concise manner, leveraging the precision of TeX and the accessibility of HTML.

title: dynamic-event-calendar
description: Dynamic-event-calendar is a JavaScript, CSS, and HTML-based project designed to create a visually appealing and interactive calendar for displaying and managing events. This project offers a dynamic way to schedule and view events, enhancing user experience with features like event creation, display, and potentially other interactive functionalities as the project evolves.

title: iot-asset-tracking
description: This repository hosts a full-stack asset tracking application built with Next.js, TypeScript, Supabase, and Tailwind CSS. The project provides a modern and scalable solution for monitoring the location and status of IoT-connected assets, leveraging real-time data management and a responsive user interface, making it a practical example for developers exploring these technologies in the context of IoT applications.

title: atg-world
description: ATG-World is a web-based project built using TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, designed to [Insert a short, high-level description of the project's purpose, e.g., visualize real-time data, provide an interactive learning experience, manage a specific workflow]. This repository serves as the codebase for [mention the core functionality or deliverable], focusing on demonstrating [mention key features or technologies used effectively].

title: fruit-seller
description: Fruit-seller is a full-stack e-commerce platform built with Next.js 14 (Pages Router), TypeScript, React, and MUI, leveraging React Query for efficient data fetching and type safety throughout the application. This project showcases a practical implementation of modern web development principles for creating a scalable and user-friendly online store focused on selling fruits, exploring key concepts like e-commerce workflows and component-based UI development.
